name: No-Bake Nutella® Oatmeal Cookies
author: TSHart
summary: No-bake drop cookies made with oatmeal, cocoa, and Nutella®. The most important step is keeping the rolling boil for at least one full minute.
ingredients: ½ cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella®)
directions: Combine sugar, butter, milk, and cocoa in a saucepan over medium heat until they are a smooth liquid
Bring to a rolling boil; continue to boil for at least 1 minute
Remove from heat and stir in chocolate-hazelnut spread and vanilla extract until dissolved
Return the pot to the still-warm burner, or the lowest setting on gas stove, and add oats
Leave the pot on the warm burner while you drop cookies by heaping spoonfuls onto wax paper
